caption.p: Patient 3 radiologic observations. Brain NMR performed 48 h after admission. Red arrowhead shows ischemic infarct in cerebellum ( A), cerebellum ( B), base nuclei ( C) and hippocampus ( D) in FLAIR ( A) and diffusion-weighted image ( Bâ€“ D). ( E, F) Stenosis in medium cerebral artery and stenosis in basilar artery, respectively.
